SEARCH
Package PEC

Class AntMoveEvent

java.lang.Object
PEC.Event
PEC.AntMoveEvent
All Implemented Interfaces:
Comparable<Event>
public class AntMoveEvent extends Event
The AntMoveEvent class represents an event of an ant moving in the Ant Colony Optimization algorithm. It extends the Event class.

  • Field Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    Ant

    The ant that is moving.
    Graph

  • Method Details

    • getTravelTime

      public double getTravelTime(Node current, Double delta)
      Calculates the travel time for an ant to move from the current node to its destination.
      Parameters:
      current - the current node
      delta - the delta parameter for travel time calculation
      Returns:
      the travel time

    • buildEvent

      public double buildEvent(double currentTime, InputTreater parameters, PEC eventQueue)
      Builds the next AntMoveEvent based on the current time, input parameters, and the PEC event queue. Updates the ant's destination and returns the scheduled time for the next event.
      Parameters:
      currentTime - the current time
      parameters - the input parameters for the algorithm
      eventQueue - the PEC event queue
      Returns:
      the scheduled time for the next event

    • processEvent

      public void processEvent(SimulationData data)
      Processes the AntMoveEvent by adding the destination node to the ant's path and checking for a Hamiltonian cycle. If a cycle is found, it is added to the simulation data. If the ant's path is longer than 2 nodes and the last node has no non-visited adjacent nodes, the cycle is removed from the path.
      Parameters:
      data - the simulation data

    • calculateProbabilities

      public double[] calculateProbabilities(Node current, List<Node> nonVisitedNodes, InputTreater parameters)
      Calculates the selection probabilities for the next node based on the current node, non-visited nodes, and input parameters.
      Parameters:
      current - the current node
      nonVisitedNodes - the list of non-visited nodes
      parameters - the input parameters for the algorithm
      Returns:
      an array of probabilities for selecting each non-visited node

    • selectNextNode

      public Node selectNextNode(List<Node> nonVisitedNodes, double[] probabilities)
      Selects the next node based on the calculated selection probabilities.
      Parameters:
      nonVisitedNodes - the list of non-visited nodes
      probabilities - the selection probabilities for each non-visited node
      Returns:
      the selected next node

    • removeCycleFromPath

      public void removeCycleFromPath(Ant ant)
      Removes the cycle from the ant's path by removing nodes after the last occurrence of the last node in the path.
      Parameters:
      ant - the ant
